doc.title: Mr. Grey
doc.plot: Life in a small Wyoming town in the 1880's takes strange turns with the arrival of Josiah Grey, schoolmaster and man of mystery. Events unfold through the eyes of young Charlie Prescott, a boy with a knack for landing right in the middle of trouble, whenever it's around. Romance, racism, gun play and behind-the-scenes skulduggery ignite this explosive coming-of-age tale.
